titleStmt.title: The characters of divine revelation a sermon preached at St. Martins in the Fields, March 4. 1694/5 : being the third of the lecture for the ensuing year, founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esquire / by John Williams ...
titleStmt.author: Williams, John, 1636?-1709.
Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ri. Chiswell, and Tho. Cockerill ...,

notesStmt.note: Half-title (p. [1]) reads: Dr. Williams's third sermon at Mr. Boyle's lecture, 1695.
"Imprimatur" (p. [2]) dated and signed: March 6. 1694/5. Guil. Lancaster.
Duplicate copies appear on reels 951 and 1110.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
